DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Gracilinanus_microtarsus_diet
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: Diet data of the gracile mouse opossum Gracilinanus microtarsus from Araujo et al. (2010), Oikos 119: 81-88, kindly provided by Dr Mauricio Araujo to Pierotti, Martin-Fernandez & Barcelo-Vidal for the simulations performed in this paper.
